[Page Title: Event Venues In Charleston SC | Meeting Street Inn]

Skip to Content 
Meetings & Events

Events In Charleston, SC

The Home of Graceful Gatherings

Welcome to where the most memorable events in Charleston, SC begin. Turn ordinary get-togethers into truly graceful gatherings by booking five or more room nights and receiving discounted rates, as well as access to neighboring event spaces by reservation and assistance from professional staff that will ensure every detail is flawless in execution. Our hotel is even available for a full buy-out, meaning you can enjoy unparalleled privacy and exclusive access to all of our amenities.
Request For Proposal

Perfect For Every Plan

Social Events

Let us set the mood for celebrations—from intimate weddings to extravagant family reunions—in faithful Charleston style. Whether your attendees are coming from near or far, they'll feel like the honored guests, thanks to our charming property and gracious staff.
Request For Proposal 
Perfect For Every Plan

Corporate Travel

Stay connected to your entire team by hosting everyone under one roof. Create, collaborate, and cast vision within walking distance from Meeting Street Inn, plus explore exciting team building activities with ease once you’re done for the day.
Request For Proposal 
Meeting Spaces

The Bancroft Suite

Specs SQ. FT.

Specs SQ. FT.

Specs Bed. FT.

Nestled just three blocks from the Meeting Street Inn on Cumberland Street, The Bancroft Suite offers an ideal setting for professional engagements. With seating for up to 16, it’s perfect for client meetings, board sessions, and depositions. Elevate your gatherings in our neighboring premier conference space.
LEARN MORE 
Meeting Spaces

1670 ROOM

Specs SQ. FT.

Specs SQ. FT.

Specs Bed. FT.

The 1670 Room is a transportive private venue designed for exclusive gatherings. It offers 1,105 square feet of handsomely appointed event space and features palmetto-inspired art, French chandeliers, and a stately fireplace. The 1670 Room isn’t on the main property, but it’s just a block away — about a five-minute walk from the hotel.
LEARN MORE

[Page Title: Meeting Street Inn | Inns In Charleston SC | Official Site]

Skip to Content 
Discover Charleston’s Historic Charm

A Timeless Hallmark Of Southern Hospitality

Welcome To The Meeting Street Inn

Bringing together traditional Southern charm and hospitality with modern-day comfort and convenience, The Meeting Street Inn offers peaceful and affordable accommodations amidst Downtown Charleston’s Historic District. Breezy, secluded balconies and a tranquil garden courtyard allow for an intimate getaway, while the allure of the city creates a romantic setting like no other.
About Our Inn 
What Sets Us Apart

Complimentary Experiences

Savor a spread of delicious continental breakfast bites before setting out, then return after hours of Charleston exploration to indulge in our evening wine and cheese reception. Enjoy a sweet treat of milk and cookies in the lobby nightly.

Historic Downtown Location

Step out for a quick stroll and find yourself perusing the city’s finest boutiques, antique shops, and award-winning restaurants in mere minutes.

Tranquil Garden Courtyard

Enjoy moments of peace and relaxation amidst our outdoor courtyard, which features lush gardens with blooming flowers, as well a rippling fountain and an oversized jacuzzi.

Valet & Self Parking

A standout feature among other inns in Charleston, SC, we offer convenient valet or self-parking near our historic hotel.

Our Accommodations

Settle Into Quaint Comfort

After a day of adventuring and exploring, retreat to the intimate atmosphere of our private accommodations, which inspire relaxation and reconnection every moment of your escape.
View Rooms 
From Our Guests

“Wonderful, quiet, clean, safe; we just love it here. Close to everything. Staff was professional. Breakfast and wine offerings are very nice. Patio is charming and quiet. Would return again.”

“It was such a nice touch to receive champagne and sweet treats in the room. The garden is the perfect place for reflecting, smelling the flowers, and even enjoying the continental breakfast.”

“The perfect hotel for our three-night visit. The room was lovely and the staff was very friendly. Best of all, we enjoyed happy hour and found it to be the perfect way to relax before heading out to dinner.”
– Faith B. | Tripadvisor – Jeff P. | Tripadvisor – Gail M. | Tripadvisor City Market Rainbow Row Waterfront Park The Meeting Street Inn 
Our Neighborhood

In The Heart of The Holy City

Situated at the center of the Historic District, Meeting Street Inn makes strolling along our city’s famed cobblestone streets—lined with iconic landmarks and legendary restaurants—simply effortless.

City Market

Exploring the Historic City Market is one of the top things to do in Charleston, SC. Peruse locally crafted goods, sample regional fare, and get to know the city’s most creative residents just a stone’s throw away from Meeting Street Inn.

Rainbow Row

Even if the story of how these 13 homes found their signature pastel hues isn’t so clear, one thing is—Rainbow Row has drawn the attention and affection of countless visitors since the mid 1700s.

Waterfront Park

Press pause on city exploring for a little, as you meander through this eight-acre waterfront respite, featuring spots to lounge in the shade, a pier, and a pineapple-shaped fountain, which offers a playful nod to the fruit’s association with Southern hospitality.
Explore Charleston
